subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The load command may be used to invoke the deployment of a transit plugin.

subsection.name: Example
subsection.p: The following example demonstrates the loading of a test plugin that uses JNI to access the Windows registry and print information back to the console.
subsection.source: Sys Account: true SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Environment DPML_HOME = C:\dpml DPML_SYSTEM = null
